ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I would absolutely recommend it if:- You have an idea and can get data for a publishable article and- The course is taught by faculty who really cares.It is a great opportunity to carve out time to work on an article, to do it in a group with some hand holding and a tight deadline, to establish a relationship with an adviser, to present your work in front of the department, and to transition from course work to own research.
Great opportunity to get feedback on an idea that interests you.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: I learned a great deal about- the publishing process- how to get from an idea to a draft paper- that it's normal when empirics don't work out immediately- how important framing is.
